lead_paragraph: A New Zealand judge ruled on Wednesday that the colorful Internet entrepreneur Kim Dotcom and three of his colleagues could be extradited.

headline.main: Megaupload Founder Can Be Sent to U.S., Judge Says
headline.print_headline: Megaupload Founder Can Be Sent to U.S., Judge Says

snippet: A New Zealand judge ruled on Wednesday that the colorful Internet entrepreneur Kim Dotcom and three of his colleagues could be extradited.
